Violent death is a **death cause category**. It means that it is a collection of **death causes** and so we can compute the probability of dying from this death cause category by adding up all of its death causes. 

#### Alternative names:
* Violence
* Violent death
* ViolentDeath

#### Death causes

Violent death consists of the following causes

* The death causes of the category *[Accidents](/model/Accidents)* [Homicide](/model/Homicide)
* [Killed by police](/model/Police)
* [Suicide](/model/Suicide)
* [Undetermined intent](/model/UndeterminedIntent)
* [War](/model/War)

#### Risk factors

Violent death has no [risk factors](/model/intro#risk-factor) in the model (yet).
